question.title: Cannot solve a coding problem with my approach
question.body:
I am beginner in dsa, i know basics of array, strings, sorting, searching and was doing some questions on leetcode which are based on arrays and strings before moving further.

Q) Write a function to find the longest common prefix string amongst an array of strings.

If there is no common prefix, return an empty string "".

My Attempt
I was thinking of getting the min length string(str) and comparing it with rest of the strings present in the array and if str doesn't matches for all the indices (except the index of str), I will delete last char of the str and will proceed further.

class Solution {
    public String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {
        String str = minLength(strs);
        for(int i = 0; i < strs.length; i++){
            if(!strs[i].contains(str)){
                
            }
        }
    }

    public String minLength(String[] strs){
        int minIndex = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < strs.length; i++){
            if(strs[i].length() < minIndex){
                minIndex = i;
            }
        }
        return strs[minIndex];
    }
}
